name: Perseidas
description:
This was made in some free hours during holidays for the Gift Jam, where the goal is to make a game as a gift for one person (tho i didn't post it on time on the jam site). Also, I kinda cheated and made it for three. Last august me and 3 friends went to the top of a little mountain called Monte Neme to see the Perseids (meteor shower that takes place every year during summer). It was a very chill moment that I remember fondly so I wanted to relive it with this little game. You can catch as many shooting stars as you want, the game has no ending 🌌

Credits:

Theme music: The End- EVA

SFX: Northeast Bling by tripjazz
